page.title: 01Review of Wimbish
page.content: The 12 sq.Km.,area covers almost the whole of Wimbish Parish.It comprises the 7 hamlets of{Cole End,Elder Street {Howlett End,Lower Green,Upper Green, {Tye Green & Wimbish.}The nearest town is Saffron Walden 7Km.to the N.W.The only industry is farming,both arable and mixed which employs 34 adults.Most people work outside the village,and many traditional cottages are being sold to commuters. A 2 bedroomed cottage can cost Â£30,000 and a redundant farmhouse can realise well over Â£100,000 .Most young children attend the Village School and many older children travel to the Comprehensive School in Dunmow.The Parish Church of All Saints and the Village Hall are the centres for religious and social life.
